help-file.title: "MIND BLANK"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: N/A Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster. Type of Spell: Enchantment
This spell has the unique ability to mentally cloak the caster by altering the perception of all who would gaze upon him. Since the victims mind itself is being altered, all detection magics have no effect on the ability to perceive the caster.
